originalTranscript: This is a test voice recording. I'm speaking to demonstrate the export functionality. The system should capture this transcript and allow me to export it along with all the metadata and optionally the audio file.
title: Test Voice Recording
summary: This is a sample voice recording demonstrating the export functionality. The recording contains important information about the project and will be exported with audio data included.
keyFacts: Export functionality supports Markdown and JSON formats
Users can choose to include or exclude audio data
Markdown exports are readable in any standard markdown viewer
